cause.description:
This is just a cause for all those out there who feel that the consumption of cannabis should be decriminilized
1. A stoned person is not a serious threat to others or theirself
2. Weed doesnt make people angry
3. Sometimes large possession simply means someone has greater PERSONAL needs
cause.mission: Incite the decriminilization of cannabis consumption
cause.name: Free the Trees N.O.R.M.L Facebook division
